en.title: FE's Philippines Country Licensee Jeremy Looi Donates Pesos 250,000 to Lighthouse Centre for Children, Philippines!
en.content:
Mock Cheque personal donation of Pesos 250,000 by FE Country Licensee Jeremy Looi to Lighthouse Centre For Children. Accepting the cheque on behalf was Lydia Veneracion, wife of Judge Lorenzo Veneracion. Witnessing the donation at FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner at Gloria Maris Restaurant on 9th May 2009 was FE Founder CEO Paul Ting , FE Spokesmen Samboy Lim and Allan Caidic, FE Presidential Director Pastor Arthur Medina, Mrs. Christabel Looi and Atty Cesar Veneracion, son of Judge Lorenzo.

FE is very proud that FE's culture of social entrepreneurship of helping the poor and needy is taking root with our successful leaders. Jeremy, we applaud you for your generosity. You are a true SOCIAL ENTREPRENEUR!
